term.title: homoleptic

item.text: Transition metal or Main Group compounds having only one type of ligand are said to be homoleptic, e.g. TaMe5.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 1077. 'Glossary of terms used in physical organic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 1121 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466051077)

item.title: Wikipedia - ホモレプティック (ja)
